WorkItem.Description:
Hey there,
First of all thank you so much for Rawr! It's such an excellent tool for planning gears/gem/enchants. It's sometimes even more addicting than WoW itself :) 
 
My issue: I am using Rawr for my kitty druid. As you can see on the main window screenshot, I am using Berserking enchant for my polearm and it ranks first on the right hand side enchants list. So far so good.
 
But when I run optimizer, it recommends me to use Mongoose enchant instead, for a small DPS increase. (And that's the only change it suggests, it's doesn't suggest any other gem/gear/enchant change)
 
What is the reason of this contradiction, and which one should I be depending on?
----------------------------------------
fyi: I have "optimization thoroughness" maxed.
----------------------------------------
main window: http://imgur.com/e6uFC.jpg
optimizer: http://imgur.com/w0WmS.jpg
 
I am attaching my file, in case needed.

Comments.Message: Are you optimizing food/elixir/flask/talents? Those don't show on the optimizer results screen.
No I am not optimizing those. Wep enchant is the only change Optimizer comes up with... Thanks
